subject: RE: [junit] assert failure without exiting test.
msgSnippet: ... Foul!! I can be at least as sarcastic as you! And I certainly have as many opinions! :-) Simon
messageBody:

>From: J. B. Rainsberger [mailto:jbrains@...]

>Subject: Re: [junit] assert failure without exiting test.
>
>
>Chappell, Simon P wrote:
>
>> >-----Original Message-----
>> >From: J. B. Rainsberger [mailto:jbrains@...]
>>
>> <snip/>
>>
>> >Agreed. Allow me to use this as one of my five free idiot
>moments of
>> >2004. I have four left.
>>
>> We get five? Woo hoo. It's gonna be a good year. :-)
>
>/I/ get five.

Foul!! I can be at least as sarcastic as you! And I certainly have as many opinions! :-)

Simon
